author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-The Trade Desk Qtrly ‍Shr $0.38​
text:
Feb 22 (Reuters) - Trade Desk Inc:
* THE TRADE DESK REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND FISCAL YEAR 2017 FINANCIAL RESULTS
* SEES FY 2018 REVENUE AT LEAST $403 MILLION * QTRLY ‍SHR $0.38​ * QTRLY ADJUSTED ‍NON-GAAP DILUTED EPS $0.54​
* FOR 2018, EXPECT GROSS SPEND ON OUR PLATFORM TO BE AT LEAST $2.1 BILLION AND REVENUE TO BE AT LEAST $403 MILLION‍​
* QTRLY ‍REVENUE $102.6 MILLION VERSUS $72.4 MILLION​ * SEES Q1 ‍REVENUE OF $73 MILLION​ * SEES ‍Q1 ADJUSTED EBITDA OF $7.5 MILLION​ * SEES Q1 ‍REVENUE OF $73 MILLION​ * Q4 REVENUE VIEW $101.7 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* ‍SEES FY 2018 ADJUSTED EBITDA OF $117 MILLION​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
